name: Maskquerade Christmas
description:
Christmas time is here, but our shopping season is much different than before! Sadly, a bunch of Freedom Supporters feel it is their right to now wear a mask, and proudly display that at their local shopping mall! However, you are more prepared than normal for this! With your trusty Mask Cannon, get your presents, mask the science deniers, and get out!

Controls

Left & Right - Move

Up - Enter Door

X - Jump

Down + X - Jump Down

C - Shoot Cannon

Enter - Pause/Menu Select
